column1: Uchi////She suggested we try soy paper for our fourth roll since we were unhappy with the nori
column2: and we agreed.  The spicy tuna crunch ended up as an inside out roll with soy paper in the middle.  It was better
column3: but we do like seaweed and prefer it for maki sushi.  The scallop nigiri's rice had way too much wasabi on it
column4: and a lot of salt on top beyond a typical garnish.
